fxInfo_label: Equal distribution of resources index ordinal
fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem equal distribution of resources index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three (_3C), four (_4C), and five (_5C) levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: How equal is the distribution of resources?
fxInfo_sources: v2dlencmps v2dlunivl v2peedueq v2pehealth v2pepwrses v2pepwrsoc v2pepwrgen
name: e_v2xeg_eqdr_3C /_4C/_5C
